title: Modern Studio at The Culver, Stainless Steel Appls, Recessed Lights
posting_body: 3325 South Canfield Avenue Los Angeles, CA 90034
Welcome to the finest in apartment living.
The Culver is located in one of the most desirable neighborhoods in West Los Angeles.
Just minutes away from downtown Culver City, you'll find wonderful shops and a variety of excellent restaurants as well as the very chic Culver Hotel.
Close to Beverly Hills and the newly revitalized Century City, an exciting nightlife is simply a short drive away.
The Kirk Douglas Theatre, Century City Playhouse and the Wallis are all located within a ten-minute drive.
The property is also centrally located to the metro line as well allowing you to get downtown easily and comfortably.
Unrivaled quality, endless comforts and gracious apartment living is what you'll find at The Culver.

Our creatively designed studio, two bedroom, and three bedroom floor plans offer the perfect blend of modern architectural design, quality amenities and beautifully designed interiors that will surely delight you.
Our amenities include exciting new kitchens with stainless steel appliances and quartz countertops, vinyl plank flooring, in-unit washer/dryers, high ceilings and some even feature private patios.
We offer our residents an array of superb community features!
Take advantage of our spacious fitness center and a relaxing outdoor rooftop deck with gas barbecues.
Our community is the perfect place to enjoy comfortable living in the city.
Experience the finest in luxury apartment living at The Culver.
Pets Welcome with an Additional Deposit.
Nearby Cities: Art District, Palms, West Los Angeles, Downtown, Mar Vista, Rancho Park, Beverlywood, Cheviot Hills, Century City, Culver City
Interiors May Not Be Of Actual Unit
